alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Garvin; Grady; McClain; Pottawatomie; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 8:24PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Garvin, southeastern Grady, northeastern Stephens, southeastern Cleveland, southwestern Pottawatomie and southeastern McClain Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 824 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Etowah to 3 miles northeast of Maysville to 5 miles north of Bray. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pauls Valley, Purcell, Slaughterville, Lindsay, Lexington, Maysville, Bray, Wayne, Paoli, Wanette, Byars, Foster, Etowah, Rosedale, Antioch, Cox City, Whitebead, Erin Springs and Trousdale. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 69 and 94. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cleveland; Garvin; Grady; McClain; Pottawatomie; Stephens
